Form: a form container¶

Form: a form container

class pymt.ui.widgets.form.form.MTForm(**kwargs)¶

Bases: pymt.ui.widgets.form.abstract.MTAbstractFormWidget

Form container : with a basic layout, you can add form widget in it, and create simple container with basic event (cancel, submit...)

Parameters:

Initial layout to be used with form
